desc: The all-purpose Firedragon fire making tool jets air right where you need it for instant flames and easy fire building. Ideal for fireplaces, wood-stoves, charcoal grills, campfires and more. The safe and effective design avoids the need for bending, burned fingers, smoke in your eyes, singed hair and all the mess!

layout.text: The Firedragon's simple and effective blow poke design jets air into the heart of your fire, making it comfortable, easy, and without all the mess
